 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזָאזֵל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==entire removal== (reduplicated intensive ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:30»§ 30</sup> n. [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 124 a</sup>), abstract, √ [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזל‎</span>] = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***remove***, see [[BDB#Bä|Bähr]]<sup>Symb. ii. 668</sup> Win<sup>ii. 659 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Schenkel|Schenkel]]<sup>BL. i. 256</sup>; &gt; most, proper name of spirit haunting desert, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Hastings, DB</sup> [a fallen angel, [[Lev.16.8|Lev 16:8]]ff. being late, according to [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>ZAW xv (1895), 153 ff., Ency. Bib.</sup>, who derives from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזזאֿל‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Ency. Bib.</sup>], as in Jewish angelology, where probably based on interpret. of [[Lev.16.8|Lev 16:8]]ff.; name not elsewhere); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Lev.16.8|Lev 16:8]]; [[Lev.16.10|Lev 16:10]] (twice in verse); [[Lev.16.26|Lev 16:26]] in ritual of Day of Atonement, = ***entire removal*** of sin and guilt from sacred places into desert on back of goat, symbol of entire forgiveness.
